params._contentChunks: The page content, pre-split into chunks by the frontend.
params._mimeType: The MIME type of the file being uploaded.

params._pageId: The ID of the page to query.

returns._0: A Page struct containing all page data.
The current value of the page ID counter.

params._pageId: The ID of the page to send a tip to.

deployPage(string,string[],string).notice: Deploys a new page by storing its content on-chain.

getAllPages().notice: Fetches all pages in reverse chronological order for the homepage feed.

getPage(uint256).notice: Retrieves all data for a specific page.

getTotalPages().notice: Returns the total number of pages ever deployed.

tip(uint256).notice: Sends a tip (in the native currency) to the owner of a page.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to deploy static websites (called "Pages") fully on-chain by storing their content in chunks. It also includes a tip jar. This version is designed for Scaffold-ETH 2 and OpenZeppelin v5+.
